name: Dummy Deck
description: Sandbox for testing new technical phrases before migration.

cards.sideA: El update Popup compara la version del dispositivo con la del profile.

sideB.text: The update popup compares the device version with the profile version.
The update popup checks the device version against the profile version.
The update popup compares the device's version with the profile's.

cards.sideA: Asi que, si tenemos 31.0.5 en el celular, y misma version en el profile, ambos hacen match.

sideB.text: So, if we have 31.0.5 on the phone and the same version in the profile, both match.
Therefore, if the phone is on 31.0.5 and the profile has the same version, it's a match.
So, if there's 31.0.5 on the mobile and the same version on the profile, they both match.

cards.sideA: Si la versión es 31.0.5 en ambos, hay match.

sideB.text: If both are version 31.0.5, they match.
If the version is 31.0.5 on both, it's a match.
If both have version 31.0.5, there is a match.
Both systems on 31.0.5 are in sync.
Both systems are synchronized on 31.0.5.
Both systems running 31.0.5 are in sync.

cards.sideA: Necesitamos un mismatch para que el popup aparezca.

sideB.text: We need a mismatch for the popup to appear.
We need a mismatch for the popup to show up.
A mismatch is required for the popup to appear.

cards.sideA: El popup solo se gatilla si hay un mismatch.

sideB.text: The popup is only triggered if there is a mismatch.
The popup only triggers when there is a mismatch.
The popup will only be triggered if a mismatch occurs.

cards.sideA: Sin mismatch, el update popup no se despliega.

sideB.text: Without a mismatch, the update popup won't display.
If there's no mismatch, the update popup won't appear.
Without a mismatch, the update popup doesn't show up.

cards.sideA: Seras redireccionado a la store para descargar la nueva version.

sideB.text: You will be redirected to the store to download the new version.
You'll be redirected to the store to download the latest version.
It will redirect you to the store so you can download the new version.

cards.sideA: Pero los testers pueden perder el link, y es normal.

sideB.text: But testers can lose the link, and that's normal.
However, testers might lose the link, and that is completely normal.
But it's normal for testers to lose the link.
That didn't sound right, haha.
That didn't sound very good, haha.
That sounded wrong, haha.
I did it to save time.
I did it in order to save time.
I did that to save some time.
I did it to buy some time.
I did it to buy time.
I did that to gain some time.

cards.sideA: Ok, necesitare hacerle un doble check a esto…

sideB.text: Ok, I'll need to double-check this...
Alright, I will need to double-check this...
Ok, I'm going to have to double-check this...

cards.sideA: Ya lo había revisado, pero deberé hacerle un doble check

sideB.text: I had already checked it, but I'll have to double-check.
I've reviewed it already, but I should double-check it.
I already reviewed it, but I will need to double-check it.
